articles.title: NAACP lists companies that dump DEI in its tactical spending guide for Black Americans - The Associated Press
articles.description: The NAACP wants Black Americans to steer their buying power toward corporations that haven’t pulled back from diversity programs under conservative pressure. The Associated Press reports exclusively that the nation’s oldest civil rights organization is listin…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) The NAACP wants Black Americans to steer their buying power toward companies that havent pulled back from diversity, equity and inclusion programs under conservative pressure, and the… [+4020 chars]

articles.author: J. Kim Murphy
articles.title: Box Office: ‘Captain America: Brave New World’ Inaugurates a $40 Million Opening Day - Variety
articles.description: Marvel's 'Captain America: Brave New World' is the biggest opening weekend of 2025, but its success is contingent on how it holds at the box office.
articles.content: Marvel’s “Captain America: Brave New World” can claim the biggest opening weekend of this young calendar year. The Disney release ripped into $40 million across Friday and preview screenings from 4,1… [+4207 chars]
